item.title: implement Comparable
item.description: Effective Java 的笔记，代码、英语原文为主，批注、翻译为辅。 Item 14: Consider implementing Comparable 考虑实现 Comparable 接口 Virtually all of the value classes in the Java platform libraries, as well as all enum types, implement Comparable.
